subject: Golf
Funerals and Memorials
lead_paragraph: Iain McGregor, who died on May 11 at age 52 at the Madeira Islands Open, was remembered at a memorial service as a tough-as-old-boots bagman who loved to tell a good story.
snippet: Iain McGregor, who died on May 11 at age 52 at the Madeira Islands Open, was remembered at a memorial service as a tough-as-old-boots bagman who loved to tell a good story.
